content: right pin scallops into place apply gentle steam from iron as per yarn manufacturer instructions let collar dry completely alternatively… for more 3d shaping pin to towel wrapped around dummy s shoulders so that collar drapes and dries exactly to fit the body charts note for stand-alone collar when following the charts below continue working the first and last 2 st in garter knitting these sts on both rs and ws to maintain the garter edging when finishing work a buttonhole-loop at top right-hand side of the collar for fastening fasten a button to the opposite side for closure
